title: 1982 Greenwich London Borough Council election
text: The 1982 Greenwich Council election took place on 6 May 1982 to elect members of <a href="Greenwich%20London%20Borough%20Council">Greenwich London Borough Council</a> in <a href="London">London</a>, England. The whole council was up for election and the <a href="Labour%20Party%20%28UK%29">Labour party</a> stayed in overall control of the council.
